++ Bracket Operator C Sharp

[] operation C# / bracket c# / C# bracket / C# [ / [ symbol C# / C# [ operator /

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Square brackets are, among other things, used to specify Attributes:


    In C#, you specify an attribute by placing the name of the attribute enclosed in square brackets (\[\]) above the declaration of the entity to which it applies.
    \[Conditional("DEBUG")\]                                 
    void TraceMethod() {}                                   
    
    
    // please note the '\' before each '[' is 
    // necessary to put these in wikidpad
